GSD.description:
NFSv4.2: fix reference count leaks in _nfs42_proc_copy_notify()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit f46f632f9cfae4b2e3635fa58840a8ec584c42e3. For more details please see the references link.
